title: Sampler, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Ex. coll. Mercur, 1928, cat. #35. Ex coll. Drake, 1913, cat. #784.
dimensions: Frame H x W: 24.1 x 24.8 cm (9 1/2 x 9 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Embroidered in pale silks on a natural linen ground. The central image is of a church with a steeple on a hill, with a tree, two girls, a dog and a sheep. A deep border of white roses surrounds the scene on three sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
